Package org.missions.objective.trigger.event.criteria

Interface EventCriteria

All Superinterfaces:
Category
All Known Subinterfaces:
BlockEventCriteria, LinkedCriteria
All Known Implementing Classes:
AfterBlockEventCriteria, DisplayNameMatchesEventCriteria, PreviousBlockEventCriteria
public interface EventCriteria extends Category
EventCriteria is a check that occurs with a event, this can be used to make sure that the event fired is the exact event, or if its just a event that you dont want but fired

    • serialize

      void serialize​(org.spongepowered.configurate.ConfigurationNode node, EventCriteriaMeta<?,​?> meta) throws ParseException, org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException, IllegalArgumentException
      serialize meta into the provided configNode. The meta must be supported by the event criteria, throws IllegalArgumentException if its not
      Parameters:
      node - node to save to
      meta - the meta to save.
      Throws:
      ParseException - Thrown if the provided meta cannot be converted into serializable objects
      org.spongepowered.configurate.serialize.SerializationException - thrown if the value cannot be serialized
      IllegalArgumentException - thrown if the meta is not of the correct type
